column1: #Text=We have to get to the airship .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Not gon na happen .
#Text=All the bison got scared off during the attack .
#Text=But , I think I know another way out .
#Text=Bolin , can you get us to that wall ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Is it just me , or is it uh , getting really warm in here ?
